name: makeTextureView(pixelFormat:textureType:levels:slices:swizzle:)
desc: Creates a new view of the texture, reinterpreting a subset of its data using a different type, pixel format, and swizzle pattern.
declaration: func makeTextureView(pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat, textureType: MTLTextureType, levels levelRange: Range<Int>, slices sliceRange: Range<Int>, swizzle: MTLTextureSwizzleChannels) -> MTLTexture?
